channel.title: R on Matthew Haffner
channel.description: Recent content in R on Matthew Haffner

item.title: The geography of Oklahoma State football recruiting: Technical approach
item.description: Introduction In this piece I’m going to describe in detail the technical aspects behind a recent a recent project that I wrote about on the geography of Oklahoma State football’s recruiting practices. This project involves extracting web content, processing text, geocoding, web mapping, and some basic exploratory spatial data analysis. I met a number of unexpected challenges along the way and I hope this will serve to help others facing similar issues.
